Content-Type: text/plain; charset=iso-8859-1
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit

::Lord Elder::
   
  Elder walks up to Jotunn, Grimlock and The AirTankers with the trooper as Salveo comes over the commlink.
   
  Elder: I will need to meet with him but after I'm finished in a current meeting with Lord Jotunn. Windlord is still looking for him though. Patch Windlord through to Perseus.
   
  Elder pauses the link to address Jotunn.
   
  Elder: Lord Jotunn. I assume you have a plan...

Kraftlos <kraftlos@...> wrote:
          "Lord Elder, nice to hear some out there. No one seems to tell us
anything..." said Salveo with sigh. "Perseus is currently busy helping
out in the medical bay, but if you need to talk to him, I can get
ahold of him. i suggest we use double-encryped channels or meet
face-to-face. No telling what these unicronian scum might be up to."

On 1/11/08, Richard Allen <roborick007@...> wrote:
> ::Lord Elder::
>
> Elder is monitering the comm channels and comes to realize that Salveo is
> trying to direct all communication and actions through the city systems.
> Elder opens a line to Salveo.
>
> Elder: This is Lord Elder of The Watchers. I have been trying to raise
> Lord Perseus but i'm sure you can get in touch with him. Status report:
> Rodimus Prime and Remus both injured. Rodimus' repairs are being taken care
> of in the CR chamber. Remus is being repaired in one as well but his
> problems could be caused by means other then just physical damage. Actally
> Rodimus Prime is now Hot Rod. The Minions succeded in their plans and
> stripped The Matrix of Leadership from Rodimus after he was defeated by
> Cyclonus in combat. Kup is currently watching over Hot Rod and Remus in the
> base med bay. Relay that to Perseus. Also tell him that we have a plan that
> I need to discuss with him.
>
> ::Kup/Hot Rod::
>
> Kup had started to nod off when one of the CR chambers chimed. It's
> process was finished. With a hiss the door on the chamber opened and Hot Rod
> stepped out.
>
> The two old friends come face to face.
>
> Hot Rod: ..... I... I failed, Kup....
>
> Kup: No you didn't, Roddy. You fought Cyclonus with everything you had.
> We'll get The Matrix back.
>
> Hot Rod: How? The Minions ae too strong. I couldn't beat one of Unicron's
> heralds with The Matrix. How am I supposed to do it without it?
>
> Kup: We'll find a way. Elder has a plan. He and Windlord went to find Lord
> Perseus and discuss it. The plan is to....
>
> Hot Rod: Later, Kup. Where are Nightlight and Elita?
>
> Kup: Nightlight is showing Hevn around the city. He made a comeback while
> you were fighting Cyclonus. I'm not sure about Elita.
>
> Hot Rod opens a comm channel to Nightlight.
>
> Hot Rod: Nightlight, this is Rodi... This is Hot Rod. Do you read me?
>
> He was met with nothing but static.
>
> Hot Rod: Hmm... I wonder whats up with that.
>
> He switches the channel to Elita.
>
> Hot Rod: Elita, this is your dad. Where are you at, honey?
>
>
> ---------------------------------
> Looking for last minute shopping deals? Find them fast with Yahoo! Search.
